contents.text: Thank you for calling HeartFlow, located in the Peninsula, pioneers in non-invasive coronary artery analysis.
For information about our HeartFlow Analysis and how it creates detailed 3D models of your coronary arteries, press 1.
To learn how we transform standard CT scan data into personalized artery models, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our clinical analytics team for an in-depth explanation.

navigationGoals: Need a quick overview of how you convert CT data into 3D coronary artery models.
I want a detailed explanation of how HeartFlow creates personalized 3D artery models from my CT data.
I’d like a detailed breakdown of the image-to-3D reconstruction pipeline your clinical analytics team employs for coronary artery modeling.
I need someone to walk me through how my CT scan data is turned into a 3D model of my coronary arteries.
I want to talk to a clinical analyst about how CT scans get turned into detailed 3D coronary artery models.

contents.text: For instructions on obtaining and submitting your CT scans for analysis, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our imaging specialists to guide you through the scan process.

navigationGoals: Need instructions on how to send you my CT scan files for analysis.
I need step-by-step guidance on obtaining and submitting my CT scans for analysis.
I need step-by-step instructions for acquiring and uploading CT DICOM datasets to your HeartFlow analysis platform.
I need help getting and sending my CT scans to you for analysis.
I need instructions on how to obtain and submit CT scan data for analysis, including the correct imaging protocols.

contents.text: For assistance with appointments and consultations, press 2.
To schedule or modify your HeartFlow Analysis appointment, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our scheduling department.

navigationGoals: Need to schedule a HeartFlow Analysis appointment.
I want to schedule or modify my HeartFlow Analysis appointment.
I’d like to schedule a HeartFlow Analysis consultation to interpret my recent CT scan results.
I want to make or adjust my appointment for the HeartFlow Analysis.
I’d like to schedule or change my HeartFlow Analysis appointment.

contents.text: For technical support with our hardware integration and software, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Need technical support integrating my CT scanner with your software.
I'm having trouble connecting my imaging hardware to the HeartFlow software and need technical support.
I’m encountering API integration issues between my PACS and your analysis software and need technical support.
I’m having trouble with the HeartFlow software—can someone help me get it working so I can see my results?
I need technical support integrating HeartFlow’s software with our imaging hardware.
